criteria_simplified_version:
The document should be divided to 3 subsections from week 1 to week 3 subsections (essemtial)

for all subsections related to weeks from 1 to 3, the subsections should cover related information about 1- at least one assignment or tasks or activities 2- at least one happenings or events or observation 3- at least one connection and Communication experience with others and organizations.
For subsection week 1, include information related to assignments
title: Documentation Communication or Happening, and a Assignment-Related Detail of Connection an Inclusion Task, Detailing Event, Information Coverage Activity Assignment, Observation Experience
